.. _context:

Context
=======

.. py:class:: Host

    Host des    extends object

    .. py:method:: load_transport(url)

        Description

        :param url: URL whehre tho bind the host


    .. py:method:: spawn(id,klass,args=[])

        Description

        :param id: ID

        :param klass: Actor class

        :param args: Arguments to the init function

        :return: Proxy of the actor

    .. py:method:: spawn_n(n,id,klass,args=[])

        Description

        :param n: Number of actors to spawn.

        :param id: ID

        :param klass: Actor class

        :param args: Arguments to the init function

        :return: Proxy of the actor

    .. py:method:: lookup(id)

        Description

        :param id: ID

        :return: Proxy of the actor

    .. py:method:: shutdown()

        Stops the host.

    .. py:method:: lookup_url(url,klass)

        Description

        :param url: url

        :param klass: Actor class to lookup.

        :return: Proxy of the actor

    .. py:method:: is_local(aurl)

        Description

        :param aurl: url

        :return: Boolean



.. py:method:: launch_actor(id,actor)

    Description

    :param id: ID

    :param actor: ID

.. py:method:: init_host(url)

    Description

    :param url: URL

    :return: Proxy of the host

.. py:method:: signal_handler(signal, frame)

    Description

    :param signal: ...

    :param frame: ...

.. py:method:: serve_forever()

    Description
